faq.question: Does it replace legal review?
faq.answer: No, it accelerates legal review. AI extracts key information so attorneys can focus on analysis and risk assessment rather than reading every page.

faq.question: What types of legal documents work?
faq.answer: Contracts, agreements, NDAs, leases, employment agreements, service agreements, legal briefs, court documents, and more.

faq.question: Can it identify non-standard clauses?
faq.answer: Yes! Ask questions like 'Are there any unusual liability terms?' to flag clauses that deviate from standard language.

faq.question: Is my legal data secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliant, attorney-client privilege maintained. Documents never used for training.

faq.question: Can I compare multiple contracts?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support contract comparison. Upload multiple contracts and compare specific clauses across all of them.

faq.question: Which plan is best for law firms?
faq.answer: Team plan ($49/mo) includes 10 users, unlimited documents, contract comparison, and advanced security features. Custom enterprise pricing available.
